```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
pbp_2021 <- read_csv("pbp-2021.csv")
names(pbp_2021)
as.numeric(pbp_2021$Minute)
as.numeric(pbp_2021$Second)
pbp<-pbp_2021%>%
mutate(m=Second/60) %>%
mutate(minute = Minute + m)

```
